ingredients.ingredient: 10 pounds fresh small beets, stems removed

cookingTips: Cook beets until fork-tender before pickling, typically 30-45 minutes depending on size
Peel beets under running water to minimize staining of your hands
Pack beets tightly in jars and cover with hot brine for proper preservation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What safety considerations are important when canning pickled beets, and how will you know when the beets are cooked to the right tenderness?
